Class ReleaseDate

java.lang.Object
com.example.legodmsproject.ReleaseDate
public class ReleaseDate extends Object
Elia Schwartz October 10, 2025, CEN 302C - 148777 Software Development 1 ReleaseDate.java This class helps create a release date object using the following attributes: month, day, year

  • Constructor Details

    • ReleaseDate

      public ReleaseDate(int month, int day, int year)
      Construct a new ReleaseDate Object to use as another attribute for a LEGO set
      Parameters:
      month - - Represents which month the LEGO Set was released
      day - - Represents what day in the month the LEGO Set was released
      year - - Represents what year the LEGO Set was released
